plot: An online web show presented by Garron Michtell, featuring interviews with the Gladiators, the contenders and all of the backstage gossip.
plot_en: An online web show presented by Garron Michtell, featuring interviews with the Gladiators, the contenders and all of the backstage gossip.

title: Gladiators Unleashed
